title: Client stuck restoring to old version of client and then cannot patch.
body:
Hello, 
I tried to login to league this morning and it said it had updates and had to restart, saying "There was a problem patching League of Legends. We'll restore a backup version and try updating again after you restart the patcher". After I hit restart, a dialogue box popped up saying "We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version." After I hit the OKAY button, the first message pops up again and I am stuck in an endless loop. I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling the client multiple times. I'm not sure what to do.

replies.body: There was a looping patcher issue today that caused errors like this.  Everything should be okay now, though!
